name: Sack Yeet 1
description:
A "fun" and "cool" game where you click and drag to yeet the main character (I think it's a leaf??) from start to finish. PLEASE play in fullscreen, it's awful if you don't. Preheat oven to 350, wash with like colors. Repeat as needed. Serves 2.

Shoutouts to kitty for some graphics, joshua for concept I think, and iirc unkl did the player sprite?? Something like that, love you guys
